law.catch_line: If the Public Service Commission fails, refuses, or is unable to direct a private carrier to perform...
law.text:
If the Public Service Commission fails, refuses, or is unable to direct a private carrier to perform a specified service requested by the Administration, the Administration:
With the transit facilities it owns or controls, may perform any transit service it considers necessary to provide adequate transit service; and
By agreement, may make reasonable subsidy payments to private carriers to encourage them to render bus service to the extent practicable.
